articles.author: Armando Tinoco
articles.title: ‘American Idol’ Crowns Season 23 Winner On ABC - Deadline
articles.description: Three 'American Idol' hopefuls made it to the final but only one of them was crowned the winner.
articles.content:
SPOILER ALERT: This post contains details of the‘American Idol‘ Season 23 finale.
Only three American Idol hopefuls made it to the finale night, and one was crowned the winner on ABC.
The three sin… [+1539 chars]
